phrases: I ate so much while cutting down on my sweets, but it did not change!
You should think about that, my dear.
Is that really what we are taking there?
We cannot go in the snow cat, I suppose?
Yuzuki-chan, you look like you could die right now.
It really is a big boat, is not it?
A Place Further Than the Universe
Cha lle nge For Ant arc tic
so on warm days, it might not even get below freezing during the day.
I will give you a quick tour before the stuff arrives and things get crazy.
That thing that looks like a stack of cubes is the control building.
If this were a house, it would be like the living room where everyone hangs out.
Those are the residence building and the warehouses.
It is what we call the lodging house for the summer team.
Normally, the members who are not staying for the winter would live there.
But because there has not been maintenance at the other building for three years,
and seeing as you are girls...
We get to use all this?
The air is very dry, so be prepared for lots of static.
But the floors are heated, and if you open the blinds...
At last, I do not have to worry about the things Kimari-san rambles in her sleep.
Do I really talk that much?
And you do it with your eyes open...
The jar genie will not come out of the toilet.
He probably will not go through the ticket gate.
Well, let us move on to the control building...
Or that was my plan, but I bet the stuff is about to start arriving.
Let us go back to the heliport.
I will have to replace this...
Okay, let us take a break until the next one arrives!
I worked part-time at a moving company.
Okay, then rest for ten minutes and then help me with the loading over there.
It might have arrived when we were in the base earlier.
We get a cell phone signal near the control building.
Wow, so we can use our smartphones, even in Antarctica?
Just stay within five meters, okay?
Yuzu, grab the mike and do a report!
Is it really okay to drop dirty snow in there?
They said it would get filtered, so it is fine.
But it is hard to breathe!
But it is just been one job after another, huh?
No one's been here for three years, so we will probably be this busy for a while.
Keeping busy is the best way to speed the clock's hands!
I thought that one up when I was working at the convenience store.
I think I prefer to keep busy.
I think I like keeping busy, too.
Well... we have been traveling together for so long, have not we?
We talked about a lot of things and had fun together, did not we?
What is with you right now?
I had an audition before we set out.
I will be playing the best friend of the protagonist.
You passed the audition for the morning drama!
But when the drama starts shooting, I will have a lot less time.
We will not be able to hang out together like this anymore!
Well, even without the drama, we would be living separately again anyway.
We are all best friends already.
But did not you say before...
that you would only just met?
Well, at the time, that was the case.
So when did you decide you were best friends?
Did it happen while I was in Hokkaido?
The three of you, without me...
Anyway, there is nothing we have done without telling you!
You really do not trust anyone, do you?
Actually, there is one thing we have not told you!
That is what being friends is, though!
But you never told me you wanted to be friends.
Let us have another productive day tomorrow!
When did we become friends, huh?
You think she was waiting this whole time for someone to say, Let us be friends?
You are obviously just saying that because I made you!
We do not have to do it.
She said she could handle it...
But she is so bold about some things and so timid about others...
Let us have another productive day!
They said we would get to work indoors...
But it is colder in here than it is outside!
We need to keep the indoor work short.
This is all of it, right?
I want you to find somewhere warm to defrost it.
I had a few I set defrosting yesterday, but it does not look like it will be enough.
And you two can stay here and help me.
That would be the best place!
What about here, in the sun?
It never sets here, after all!
I do not think that matters to them.
But how are things going with the other thing?
Do you know the most important parts of life on the station?
We will be living a spartan life in a limited space for a long time, after all.
It is time for your pick-me-up.
It is not that I do not like it...
But it is like a birthday, is not it?
It is not fair, is it?
Everybody has a birthday, yet there are people whose birthdays get celebrated,
and people whose birthdays do not.
You want to get the external shots in advance?
Since they said we might not be able to go outside if the wind picks up.
About that thing I mentioned before...
I have decided to do the drama.
I gave it a lot of thought,
and apparently some people here may be looking forward to it.
So, could I ask a favor of you all?
This way, even after our adventure is over,
and we are not around each other as often, I know we will be fine.
I have been all alone before, so I know.
You do not know, do you?
Do not leave a scrap behind!
If you do not clean your plate, you will be denied bathroom privileges!
It says partially frozen rice bowl on the menu!
That is one way to put it.
Um... after dinner, I was hoping to talk to you.
Sorry, I have something I have to take care of.
I do not know if I know what to say to her.
She is not mad, or anything.
If I were in your position, I would probably feel the same way.
Friendship is not about lots of words.
For instance, let us say you tell Kimari you like her.
Kimari does not believe you, so she wants you to write it down on a piece of paper.
You would feel like she did not trust you.
That is probably why she was crying.
Yuzu, Kimari already sees you as a friend.
There is probably no real way to define it.
It is not like a parental or spousal relationship.
It is more vague than that.
No one's to blame if it fades.
That is the case for me, at least.
But that is what let us it feel unrestrained.
That is what let us us be together.
Are there good children here, too?
Are there good children here, too?
Why even bother with the performance?
That is why I did not want to do this!
Why did you make us do it?
I really do not think I understand...
Could we talk for a minute?
It is hard to settle down when it stays dusk like this, huh?
It is like the day never ends.
You are angry, are not you?
Because you did not have anything to apologize for.
Megu-chan has been my best friend since kindergarten.
Right before I headed out, she said she wanted to break things off...
But I still think of her as a friend, so...
She does not respond often, does she?
When I am watching the screen,
and it pops up with the little message read sign.
sometimes right away, sometimes after a while,
Each time I see it, I can tell.
Ah, I bet she is at school right now.
I bet she is in bed.
I bet she is not sure whether or not she should respond.
I can tell just how she is feeling.
I think that is what friends are for me.
It is totally vague, I know, but that is what it is for me.
I guess that does not solve anything...
Yuzuki-chan, it is was your birthday before, right?
But we spent so long being seasick at the time...
Kimari suggested that we should celebrate it in Antarctica.
We had Yumiko-san set the ingredients aside.
Well, just fill in the parts we messed up with your imagination.
This is just like the first time we met you, huh?
Blow them out before they melt.
I messed up my first time!
But when the question gets put to you, it is hard to express it, huh?
Wow, after you burn it, there is so little left.
But they say when they take back a whole year's worth of garbage it will be like a mountain.
I think friendship is this one little word!
But it is better than your quotes, Hinata.
